title: ‘My Helmet Saved Me Today’: Evenepoel, Roglič Involved in Massive Crash at Critérium du Dauphiné, Stage Neutralized
content:
UPDATE: Kruijswijk, Van Baarle to miss Tour de France. Dozens of riders crash on wet roads and officials cancel the stage: 'A domino effect in the group.'

Read the full article at ‘My Helmet Saved Me Today’: Evenepoel, Roglič Involved in Massive Crash at Critérium du Dauphiné, Stage Neutralized on Velo.
author: ahood
